directions: In a mixing bowl combine olive oil, shallot, garlic, cherry tomatoes, beef brisket, fresh thyme and season with salt and pepper.
Then stuff all the mixed ingredients into the fresh button mushrooms and top it with the shredded Mainland Colby.
In a preheated oven with a temperature of 180 degrees Celcius, bake for about 10 minutes or until well cooked. Serve hot.
ingredients: A pinch of salt and pepper to taste
title: Stuffed Mushroom With Beef Brisket
